basic_information.scholarship_name: Alice Adele Way Endowed Elementary Education Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education. Eligibility Requirements Junior or senior who is not eligible to graduate at the time selected Minimum of 3.0 GPA Demonstrates financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipient must write a thank you letter to the scholarship donor

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
